DataElement.preferredName: Patient Enrollment Trial Screened Completion Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether a patient was enrolled in the clinical trial for which he/she was screened.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Clinical Study Enrollment Trial Screening Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.:Enrollment; to insert, register, or enter in a list, catalog, or roll. (Merriam-Webster Online)

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Property.preferredDefinition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
